import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchCart } from "../../JS/actions/product"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import "./card.css"; function OrderSummary(props) { useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { await props.fetchCart(props.user.id); } catch (error) {} fetchData(); }; }, [props.user.id]); return (

); } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ user: state.account.user, cart: state.product.cart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart })(OrderSummary);
